text: Tyanantara amhi satatyane rasula (paigambara) pathavile. Jya janasamuhajavala jya jya velesa tyaca paigambara ala, tyane tyasa khote tharavile tevha eka pathopatha eka janasamuha nasta karita rahilo ani tyanna kis'sa- kahani banavuna sodale. Dhihkkara aso tya lokanca je imana svikarata nahita
